package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"values":["32","64","Both"],"helpString":"For target devices running a 64-bit OS, indicate whether values associated with keys related to Application package_spec.name: Uninstall MSI ||Installed Applications_Name||
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:3600 uninstall.vbs "||Installed Applications_Silent Uninstall String||" "||Installed Applications_Uninstallable||"

package_spec.name: Managed Application Upgrade - ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Name|| ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Current Version||
package_spec.command: cmd /c ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Command|| & cmd /c cscript //T:3600 "..\..\Tools\Managed Applications\run-managed-applications-scan.vbs"

package_spec.display_name: Service Start Mode - Set to Disabled
package_spec.name: Service Start Mode - Set to Disabled
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:600 set-service-mode.vbs "||Service Details_Service Name||" Disabled

package_spec.display_name: Service Start Mode - Set to Automatic
package_spec.name: Service Start Mode - Set to Automatic
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:600 set-service-mode.vbs "||Service Details_Service Name||" Automatic

package_spec.display_name: Service Start Mode - Set to Manual
package_spec.name: Service Start Mode - Set to Manual
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:600 set-service-mode.vbs "||Service Details_Service Name||" Manual

package_spec.name: Modify Tanium Client Setting
package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"values":["REG_DWORD","REG_SZ"],"helpString":"Required: Select one registry value type","requireSelection":true,"promptText":"Choose a registry value type","defaultValue":"","value":"","label":"RegType","key":"$1","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter"},{"restrict":null,"validationExpressions":[{"helpString":"Only alpha characters allowed","flags":"","expression":".\\S*","parameterType":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression","model":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression"}],"helpString":"Required: Enter the client setting name. Be sure to include underscores '_' where needed. Spaces are generally not supported.","promptText":"Client Setting Name","defaultValue":"Client Setting Name goes here","value":"Client Setting Name goes here","label":"ValueName","maxChars":64,"key":"$2","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"},{"restrict":null,"validationExpressions":[],"helpString":"Required: Enter the client setting data. Enter word 'remove' to delete the setting.","promptText":"Client Setting Data","defaultValue":"Client Setting Data goes here","value":"Client Setting Data goes here","label":"ValueData","maxChars":256,"key":"$3","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"}],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}

package_spec.display_name: Set Windows Tanium Client Logging Level
package_spec.name: Set Windows Tanium Client Logging Level
package_spec.command: cmd /c reg add "HKLM\Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" /v LogVerbosityLevel /t REG_DWORD /d $1 /f
package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"stepSize":1,"maximum":99,"helpString":"Enter a logging level, 0=no logging, 99=verbose logging","snapInterval":1,"minimum":0,"defaultValue":"1","value":"1","label":"Log Level (0-99)","key":"$1","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter"}],"parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}
